Keyboard.name: Apple Magic Keyboard
Keyboard.description: Magic Keyboard is available with Touch ID, providing fast, easy and secure authentication for logins and purchases.

Keyboard.name: Logitech Keyboard
Keyboard.description: Designed with speed and precision, the Logitech G915 X Low-Profile Wired Gaming Keyboard lets you achieve peak gaming performance. With customizable features, you can elevate your skills and add style to your setup.

Laptop.name: Acer
Laptop.description: Offering fast computing capabilities and ample storage, the Acer Aspire Lite 16 16-inch i5-1334U/8GB/512GB SSD Laptop can handle any task with ease.

Laptop.name: Lenovo
Laptop.description: With its 360° convertible setup, durable, drop-down hinge, powerful AMD Ryzen™ processor, and full-function Type-C™ port, the Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 is a practical and versatile workspace option.

Microwave.name: LG
Microwave.description: Making food preparation easy and convenient, the LG NeoChef 42L Smart Inverter Microwave Oven - Black offers a large capacity and versatile cooking modes.

Microwave.name: Panasonic
Microwave.description: With a flawless flatbed design meaning no turntable, a premium stainless steel finish and 16 cooking functions, this inverter microwave will tick all your boxes.

Monitor.name: MSI
Monitor.description: With Adaptive Sync technology, a high refresh rate, and a fast response time, the MSI 27inch G27C4 E3 FHD 180HZ Curved Gaming Monitor effectively eliminates screen tearing.

Monitor.name: Samsung
Monitor.description: Immerse yourself in the world of high-quality visuals with the Samsung 27-inch S39C FHD Curved Monitor.

ScientificEquipment.name: Batterymate
ScientificEquipment.description: A versatile tool for electricians and technicians, the BatteryMate XL830L helps you get precise measurements with ease.

ScientificEquipment.name: Digital Volt
ScientificEquipment.description: Measure a variety of power indicators to help prevent peak currents damaging components.
